content: 3 day auction!!  Up for auction is a beautiful, ungraded 2014 Cryptolator Copper 1oz “Bitcoin Unchained”, #335 (Unfunded), with COA, and the original blue leather case in near perfect condition since it’s always been in the original bag in storage.This is one of those coins that should grade very well, so I did not take it out of the capsule for pictures, but can do so if someone desires. (This coin is made by the famous NWTM, which has since gone out of business, but they did produce some of the highest grading coins in the past, like Smoothie’s Silver Monero series etc). Click for bigger images:Coin Address - https://blockchair.com/bitcoin/address/1FPYrnK4WucdbcihcATKPBGYK33TrirMjFStarting bid: 0.0 BTCMinimum bid increments: 0.0025 BTCEnd time : Sunday, 20 November 2022, 15:00:00 (3PM EST - New York Time) - Countdown TimerSniping : Bids within 10 minutes per lot before the auction end extend the auction an additional 10 minutes per lot. Shipping : USPS First Class USA - $10 First class Anywhere else Depends on your shipping preferences, will have to let you know etc. Payment: Bitcoin Escrow with MoparMiningLLC , or your choice - winner pays fees/re-shipping etc.Thanks and Good luck!   Edit - Any questions just PM me!
